channel.title: Text/Image help
channel.description: Hi, I need help with a few things (not sure if this is client sided). The top picture shows a "|" instead of the "*" for box which you type in, how to I change it back to "*"? In the bottom picture you can see the writing is white instead of yellow, how do I change it back to white? [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/34lk8.jpg[/img] Thank you!

item.title: Text/Image help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I can only go by what I said in my first post, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Text/Image help
item.dc:creator: @RealmofOmens RealmofOmens
item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

I managed to find the “|” in the client as you said, so thank you for that. But I’m still having trouble finding the IG chat colour.

Thank you again.

Read full topic

item.title: Text/Image help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Go to your Client class, client sided and around the area where it displays the “Username:” and “Password:” text on the titlebox, search for the “|” character, and then change it.

If you’re unsure, post the line.

EDIT: try method18 and method93 (search them).

Oh, and as for the white part I’d assume search for @whi@ until you come across something that may be it, although don’t count on it. Again post anything you suspect and someone can take a look.

Maybe use another client as reference (for methods and such that are different to yours regarding @whi@ and |/*.

Read full topic

item.title: Text/Image help

item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

Hi, I need help with a few things (not sure if this is client sided). The top picture shows a “|” instead of the “" for box which you type in, how to I change it back to "”? In the bottom picture you can see the writing is white instead of yellow, how do I change it back to white?

Thank you!

Read full topic
